types.name: Authentication
types.summary: A class containing the information used to authenticate a user at the Zermelo API. To create anAuthenticationobject using an authorization code, use theZermeloAuthenticatorclass. If you already have a token, you can use the constructor to create anAuthenticationobject.

types.name: ZermeloAuthenticator
types.summary: This class gives an object that can be used to generate anAuthenticationobject using an authorization code. TheAuthenticationobject can than be used to connect to the Zermelo API using anZermeloConnectionobject.

types.name: ZermeloConnection
types.summary: This class gives an object that can be used to connect to the Zermelo API. It has properties for the currently supported endpoints, that can be used to connect to the corresponding endpoint.
